node.title: messagechat
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `messagechat` ( `messagechat_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `msgtext` char(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tstamp` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `room` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`messagechat_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
